rooms.name: Open Courtyard Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Central open space with Vastu-compliant entry, acting as the transitional area from outdoors to indoors.

rooms.name: Living Room & Kitchen
rooms.description: Bohemian styled living room adjacent to a modern kitchen. Incorporates large windows for natural light and airflow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Separate dining space near the living area with an open view of the courtyard.

openings.location: North West corner of plot aligned with Vastu directions
openings.description: Ensures positive energy flow into the home.
Provides a private outdoor seating area and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with Vastu-optimized placement for relaxation. Includes an en-suite bathroom.

rooms.name: Study/Closet Area
rooms.description: Multi-functional room adjacent to the bedroom, doubling as a study or additional storage space.

openings.location: Central staircase connecting both floors for seamless transition.
openings.description: Vastu-compliant placement ensuring safety and energy balance.

rooms.name: Courtyard Rooftop
rooms.description: Expansive open roof deck that wraps around the central courtyard, designed with Bohemian aesthetics and Vastu-aligned layout.
